author: SkinnyTaste
name: Spicy Canned Salmon Salad Rice Bowl

ingredients.ingred_name: skinless wild pink or red salmon
Furikake or chopped nori and sesame seeds

instructions: In a small bowl, combine the salmon, mayonnaise, sriracha, scallion whites and pinch of salt and mix well. In the bowl you plan to serve in, add the rice. Top it with the salmon salad, chopped cucumber, furikake and scallion greens plus more sriracha if desired.
